description:
When I go down to the studio for a shoot and I find a new girl there, I spend some time sizing her up. I want to get an idea of her experience with BDSM, to find out what her motivations are and to learn about what kind of person she is.

To put it bluntly (and accurately,) Felony is a bitch in heat. It’s obvious that she is so desperate for constant sexual release that she probably humps furniture when people aren’t looking.

The bondage she gets is good and hard and then some and she takes it all, no matter how severe. Oh yeah, she squirts too because once she’s turned on she loses all control of herself.
title: Teapot 2: The Explosion
